headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Top Fun
content:
Top Fun asks a simple question: can a pack of hardscrabble escape vehicles survive dogged pursuit by a fleet of Lazer fighter jets? Runners have to evade the maverick pilots and their state-of-the-art weaponry, while the Hunters do their damnedest to reduce their enemies to smoky bits of rubble.

All Top Fun competitors will earn 2X GTA$ and RP for playing.
